title: Liquid Bar at TRIA
typeOfFood: Organic, Thai, Western, Juice bar, Fusion, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Restaurant and snack bar located inside a spa facility. Tea garden setting. Has raw food menu, juices, salads, extensive tea selection, snacks and desserts. Located behind Piyavate Hospital. Address in Thai: 998 ถนนริมคลองสามเสน แขวงบางกะปิ เขตห้วยขวาง กรุงเทพฯ 10310, ประเทศไทย.
